entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
